name: purescript-isomorphic-react-example
description: Isomorphic React App Example in Purescript

scripts.build: mkdirp 'dist/static'; mkdirp 'output/css'; pulp build -m Jam.App; browserify -p [css-modulesify -o dist/static/style.css] -o dist/static/index.js output/Jam.App/index.js

author: Marcin Szamotulski
